com.foxconn.ebook.reader.engine.core
接口 EngineCode.EngineMsgCode

正在封闭类：
EngineCode
public static interface EngineCode.EngineMsgCode

Engine相關的信息代碼，包含錯誤和异常碼

字段摘要
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_ADD_HIGHLIGHT_FAILED
          添加高亮選擇失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_CLOSE_FAILED
          關閉書籍失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_CLOSE_PREVIOUS_FAILED
          關閉之前打開的書失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_DEL_HIGHLIGHT_FAILED
          刪除高亮選擇失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_INVALID
          書籍不存在或格式不正確.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_NOT_EXISTS
          書籍不存在.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOK_ROTATE_SCREEN_FAILED
          旋屏失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOKMARK_ADD_FAILED
          添加書簽失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOKMARK_DEL_FAILED
          刪除書簽失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_BOOKMARK_GOTO_FAILED
          跳轉書簽失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_CODE_ERROR
          代碼錯誤.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_COMMENT_DELETE_FAILED
          刪除批注失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_COMMENT_INIT_FAILED
          初始化批注模塊失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_COMMENT_LOAD_FAILED
          讀取批注失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_COMMENT_NOT_INIT
          批注模塊尚未初始化.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_COMMENT_SAVE_FAILED
          保存批注失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_ENGINE_ERROR
          Engine錯誤.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_PAGE_NUMBER_INVALID
          頁碼錯誤.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_RECORDER_LOAD_FAILED
          讀取數據記錄失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_RECORDER_SAVE_FAILED
          保存數據記錄失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_RENDER_FAILED
          渲染失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_SEARCH_GO_NEXT_FAILED
          搜索下一條結果失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_SEARCH_GO_PREVIOUS_FAILED
          搜索上一條結果失敗.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_TASK_SERVER_CRASH
          任務管理器崩潰.
static int ENGINE_ERROR_TASK_SERVER_NOT_RUNNING
          任務管理器尚未運行.
static int ENGINE_FATAL_OUTOF_MEMORY
          超出內存範圍.
static int ENGINE_NORMAL_TASK_CLEAR
          任務列表已清除.
static int ENGINE_WARN_CHAPTER_DOWN_FAILED
          跳轉到下一章節失敗.
static int ENGINE_WARN_CHAPTER_INDEX_FAILED
          錯誤的章節序號.
static int ENGINE_WARN_CHAPTER_JUMP_FAILED
          章節跳轉失敗.
static int ENGINE_WARN_CHAPTER_UP_FAILED
          跳轉到上一章節失敗.
static int ENGINE_WARN_MAX_FONT
          已到達最大字體.
static int ENGINE_WARN_MIN_FONT
          已到達最小字體.
static int ENGINE_WARN_SEARCH_KEY_NULL
          搜索關鍵字為空.
static int ENGINE_WARN_SEARCH_RESULT_NULL
          搜索結果為空.
static int NO_ERROR
          無錯誤.
static int STATE_ERROR_DB_ADD_BOOKMARK_FAILED
          添加書簽至數據庫失敗.
static int STATE_ERROR_DB_ADD_EMPHASIS_FAILED

static int STATE_ERROR_ZOOM_OUT_FAILED
